title: Season 10 is probably the worst in history.
body:
League feels awful to play.
The comeback pontential is gone.
The matchmaking is worse than ever aswell as the balance.
The report system isn´t working properly.
The Client is bugged and clunky.
Flamers, Trolls and rage quitters every single game.
Most Champions that are released have overloaded kits that are literally impossible to balance.

I´ve been playing this game for over 6 years and I can say that from all the seasons I´ve played, this one is from far the worst.
